answerText: The Birthday Party[10] This other Pinter play is about Teddy and Ruth who visit Teddy's family in London after having lived in America. Ruth ends up having an affair with Teddy's brother Joey.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 13 - Finals 1 | 7 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The main character of this play is gifted a toy drum by Lulu, and Goldberg and McCann break his glasses. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Harold Pinter play about the title event for Stanley Webber which takes place at Meg and Pete's boarding house.
